sentences.en: Bert was a footloose, unemployed actor.
sentences.cn: 伯特是不受雇于任何人的自由演员。

sentences.en: Example : They are working happily with Kent's, though sometimes pining for the footloose school days.
sentences.cn: 我还在桑德森公司工作, 而且工作很称心—虽然偶尔我也渴望从前自由自在的日子.
在欧洲旅游、自由自在的学生

sentences.en: Here she was, at forty, footloose and fancy - free in New York.
sentences.cn: 她那时在纽约, 年届四十, 自由自在,无拘无束.

sentences.en: If the ability footloose and last H net, be on night shift all can, ha ha.
sentences.cn: 如果能自由自在的上H网, 上夜班都可以, 呵呵.

sentences.en: In the eyes of the public, a divorced man is footloose and fancy-free.
sentences.cn: 在公众心目中，离婚的男人无牵无挂、自由自在。

sentences.en: Modern finance a footloose industry, so threat seems at least partially credible.
sentences.cn: 现代金融业不受地域限制, 因此,这种威胁至少在一定程度上还是有威慑力的.

sentences.en: People that are single tend to be more footloose.
sentences.cn: 单身的人往往更加无拘无束。

sentences.en: Since my divorce I've been really happy - footloose and fancy - free again!
sentences.cn: 自从离婚后我真正地快乐 ─ 再一次自由自在且无拘无束的!

sentences.en: When the kids leave home, you’ll be footloose and fancy-free (= free and without worries ) .
sentences.cn: 孩子离家之后，你就会自由自在、没有牵挂了。

sentences.en: You will be footloose and fancy free soon enough.
sentences.cn: 你很快就会自由自在,无拘无束了.

words.tran_cn: 自由自在的，不受束缚的

trans.tran_cn: 未婚的，独身的，自由自在，无拘无束
trans.tran_en: free to do exactly what you want because you have no responsibilities, for example when you are not married or do not have children
